ygData.subject: Re: EQ  Xegony
ygData.msgSnippet: in order to transfer guild leadership to someone else you type in /guildleader  (but then you may already have known that)
ygData.messageBody:
in order to transfer guild leadership to someone else you type in
/guildleader <name> (but then you may already have known that)

David Lari wrote:
>
> From: "David Lari" <kerik@...>
>
> Seems like most people play on Rodcet Nife or Brell Serilis. But the best
> thing to do is find out what time(s) people play (and of course what time
> zone) and team up with someone whose schedule will fairly closely match
> yours. When I was actively playing, I found that only a few of use played at
> the same times.
>
> If you decide to start a character on Brell, or if you want my account, let
> me know. I will be canceling my account soon and I want to give my stuff to
> a guild member, or if anyone wants a level 21 gnomish necro, I'll be glad to
> let someone have my account.
>
> Also, still looking for someone to take over as guild leader on Brell. I
> have someone who is willing to become the overall owner of the guild and am
> going to find out how to transfer it to him, but still need the leader on
> Brell.
>
> David
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: J Dye <gaelad@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 10:23 AM
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] EQ Xegony
>
> > From: J Dye <gaelad@...>
> >
> >
> > Well.. it's December 6th and the list has been pretty
> > quiet. =) Here's what's up with me...
> >
> > I sold my account (Gaelad on Xegony) since I didn't
> > think I was going to be able to play after my hand
> > surgery (and after losing interest in the game), but
> > my hand is better so I am starting over. I was just
> > curious of what servers had the most of "us" that gets
> > this list--and is there anyone on Xegony?? =)
> >
> > the enchanter formerly known as Gaelad
> >
> >
